0

Question 52 
 
In a machining operation, if a cutting tool traces the workpiece such that directrix is perpendicular to 
the plane of the generatrix as shown in figure, the surface generated is
Directrix

Generatrix
Production Engineering (Machining) 
 
(A) spherical  
 
 
(B) cylindrical  
 
(C) a surface of revolutions 
 
(D) plane  
Ans. 
B 
Sol.
Directrix
Cylindrical surface generated.
Generatrix
